function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misunderstanding or misinterpretation of Indigenous knowledge and practices","Impact":"Ineffective integration of Indigenous knowledge into disease mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Engaging with Indigenous communities directly, consulting with Indigenous knowledge holders, and prioritizing cultural competency training for all involved stakeholders","Technologies":"Cultural awareness training, community engagement platforms, and collaborative decision-making tools","People":"Indigenous communities, researchers, and stakeholders in disease mitigation","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Disregard for the interconnectedness of the living and inanimate world","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of environmental factors in disease transmission and mitigation","Mitigation":"Promoting ecological awareness and holistic approaches to disease control, integrating traditional ecological knowledge into disease mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, ecosystem mapping tools, and traditional ecological knowledge databases","People":"Researchers, environmentalists, and stakeholders in disease mitigation","Owner":"Environmental organizations, policymakers, and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Imposition of Western conceptions of land ownership and property rights","Impact":"Marginalization of Indigenous communities and their knowledge in disease mitigation efforts","Mitigation":"Advocating for the recognition of Indigenous land rights and governance systems, involving Indigenous leaders in decision-making processes, and promoting equitable resource allocation","Technologies":"Digital mapping tools, land rights databases, and participatory decision-making platforms","People":"Indigenous communities, policymakers, and stakeholders in disease mitigation","Owner":"Policy makers, advocates for Indigenous rights, and stakeholders"}]}
